channel.title: How can i fix stupid log out after u kill a barrows bro?{REWARD}
channel.description: How can i fix stupid log out after u kill a barrows brother? i think its because its in my npc handler, and its supposed to get slayer up idk how to fix it and i want them to give u slayer xp. How can i do this u will get a reward!

item.title: How can i fix stupid log out after u kill a barrows bro?{REWARD}
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

case 18: //Slayer
sendFrame164(12123);
sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced a slayer level!”, 6207);
sendFrame126(“Your slayer level is now “+playerLevel[18]+” .”, 6208);
sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just advanced a slayer level.”);
stillgfx(199, absY, absX);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;

this is what mines looks like should i erase still gfx?

item.title: How can i fix stupid log out after u kill a barrows bro?{REWARD}
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Try c, but you need to add a void for it.

static client = c; public HANDLERNAME(client c) { this.c = c;
Goes under the class ^^

Omg, I can’t copy and paste it ffs, but I’ll pm it to you later, as I do have the void for addskillxp, I’ll pm it to you.
